content.rendered:
Directed by Sanjay Gupta

Written by Robin Bhatt. Sanjay Gupta. Sanjay Gupta. Vaibhav Vishal

Cast John Abraham (Amartya Naik). Emraan Hashmi (Savarkar). Mahesh Manjrekar (Bhau). Suniel Shetty (Sada Anna (as Sunil Shetty)). Kajal Aggarwal (Seema (as Kajal Agarwal)). Prateik Babbar (Arjun Naik (as Pratiek Babbar)). Gulshan Grover (Nari Khan). Amole Gupte (Gaitonde). Rohit Roy (Baba (as Rohit Bose Roy)). Samir Soni (Sunil Khaitan). Anjana Sukhani (Sonali Khaitan). Shaad Randhawa (Jagannath (as Shaad Randahawa)). Tithi Raaj (Neelam). Vivaan Parashar (Sadashiv). Rajendra Gupta (Amar Dad). Kannan Arunachalam (Inspector Mastekar (as Kanan Arunachalam)). Akash Khurana (Seth Sadanand). Sushil Tyagi (Jailer). Pawan Chopra (Commissioner Mario). Sandesh Jadhav (Samant). Vinod Pulawale (Samant’s Partner (as Vinod Pulawle)). Praful Samant (Home Minister). Suhas Palshikar (Seema’s Father). Yogesh Shirsat (Patil (as Yogesh Sirsat)). Sanjay Bhatia (DCP at Bhau Mansion). Shivraj Walvekar (Inspector). Prasanna Ketkar (Inspector). Ashish Warang (Political Leader). Sanjeev Chadha (Potya). Prince Kanwal (Sarvarkar Constable). Ivan Rodrigues (Journalist). Gautam Berde (Doctor). Milind Adhikari (Narcotics Inspector). Vivek Tandon (Arjun’s Lawyer). Vinod Goswami (Shack Owner). Anand Alkunte (Inspector). Umakant Patil (Inspector). Mehrnosh Mistry (Pilot (as Mehernosh Mistry)). Ramakant Dayma (Neelam’s Father). Anuradha Rajadhyaksha (Neelam’s Mother). Akash Moite (Black Marketeer). Akshata Kambali (Samant’s Wife). Arpitha Ghogardare (Samant’s Daughter). Abha Velankar (Gaitonde’s Wife (as Aabha Velankar)). Rudha Sagar (Gaitonde’s Daughter). Sanjivani Oghale (Gaitonde’s Mother). Harsh Sharma (Arjun Jr). Rajveer Desai (Sarwarkar’s Son). Abhimanue Arun (Jadhav (Amar’s Gang) (as Abhimanyue Arun)). Kachoo Ahmed Khan (Gotya (Amar’s Gang) (as Kacho Ahamad Khan)). Lala Tiger (Manku (Amar’s Gang)). Vinayak Chavan (Ganpat (Amar’s Gang)). Varun Pande (Suresh (Amar’s Gang)). Rahul Mahajan (Chandu (Amar’s Gang)). Sandeep Juwatkar (Pawle (Amar’s Gang)). Maharaj Nagar (Namdev (Amar’s Gang)). Manohar Pandey (Amar’s Goon). Akshay Ahire (Gaitonde’s Gang). Vinod Channa (Gaitonde’s Gang). Bhpendra Negi (Gaitonde’s Gang). Ashish Ingle (Gaitonde’s Gang). Niranjan Javir (Gaitonde’s Gang). Rahul Gupta (Gaitonde’s Gang). Satya Ranjan (Gaitonde’s Gang). Kamila Ratikant (Gaitonde’s Gang (as Ratikant Kamila)). Dhairyasheel Gholap (Gaitonde’s Gang (as Dhairasheel Gholap)). Deepak Anand (Nari Khan’s Gang). Priyadarshan (Nari Khan’s Gang). Abhishek Mahendru (Nari Khan’s Gang (as Abhishek Mehendru)). Raghav Sahani (Nari Khan’s Gang). Naresh Malilk (Nari Khan’s Gang). Rohit Lamba (Nari Khan’s Gang). Niranjan Jadhao (Nari Khan’s Gang). Devesh Siwal (Nari Khan’s Gang). Sodi Sultan (Nari Khan’s Gang). Syed Firdaus (Nari Khan’s Gang (as Syed Firdaus Hassan)). Praveen Shrivastava (Nari Khan’s Gang). Deepak Maan (Nari Khan’s Gang). Jitendra Lad (Nari Khan’s Gang). Prashant Gite (Nari Khan’s Gang). Reapstar (Hasmi (as hasmi)). Anjali Atre (Gaitonde’s Bhabhi #1). Varun Buddhadev (Bhau’s Grandson #1). Sanvir Habib (Sanvir Habib).Md Anan Islam. Tirth Joisher (Bhau’s Grandson #2). Rohit Lamba (Nari khan gang). Anjali Maideo (Gaitonde’s Bhabhi #2). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)).Mohd. Saif. Harsh Sharma (Young Arjun (junior)). Praveen Srivastava (Goon). Hitesh Tejpal (Doctor #3). Dharmendra Tripathi (Inspector #3). Naushaad Abbas (Mob Protester at Hospital (uncredited)). Rohit KaduDeshmukh ((uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Krish Ahir. Sangeeta Ahir. Vinod Bhanushali. Shiv Chanana. Hanif Chunawala. Anuradha Gupta. Md Anan Islam. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Zahir Shah. Gary Van Shipley

Production Sangeeta Ahir Movie. T-Serie. White Feather Film
